name: for(EVER) Looped
description:
You live in this loop from long time, but you feel you need to escape it. Controll the ball to get goal and increase i counter.

In this game you use:

- Mause - aim where ball should go;

- Spacebar - set ball position to default (in case ball will "escape" the loop XD);

- Escape - pause;

Game was created for Black and White Jam #8. Proces of making you can find in the future on this chanel (PL):  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQAv2gThrv7RhPi-ebWRa6A

I'm sorry for my bad english. Have a great day!

Music from: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCehIXMLpmRqDzqB5Ov89v5A
